title: #BecauseMiami: Agua, Mierda y Factoria
description:
A dead engineer has been signing off on safety inspections for buildings across South Florida. Billy Corben will tell you more about it. Plus, we have The Lightning Round. And N. Patrick Range, former chairman of the Virginia Key Beach Park Trust Board, joins the show to tell us how he and the rest of the board were unduly ousted by the Miami City Commission.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
